file_content.text: You've already ruined my slave sales--there's nothing left I can do for you.
Good luck with your investigations.
You're Shenax? I hear you're selling slaves for the Twin Suns.
A noble Jedi, visiting my humble self. I'd be honored, if I thought you had any business here.
A Republic military officer, on our humble planet. Pity you have no business here.
I am Shenax, but I can't imagine what business it is of yours.
Slave trading is perfectly legal on Tatooine. As for the notion that I consort with the Twin Suns, well--I take pains to ensure my wares' legitimacy.
Local security is already involved; Encot sent me personally. I suggest you cooperate.
The sheriff won't be happy.
I... see. Then I do so under protest.
The slaves are being held in the spaceport--these are the hangar details. I expect the militia will appreciate my aid.
I'm not here to cause you trouble. But if the Twin Suns fooled you into working with them, we need to find out the truth.
I need your help.
I see your point. Perhaps triple-checking would put everyone at ease.
The slaves are being held in the spaceport--these are the hangar details. If you find anything, of course, I'll return my unspent profits to you.
You will tell me where the slaves are, and make reparations for your actions.
[Force Persuade] You'll help.
I can tell you where the slaves are--they're in one of the spaceport hangars.
Perhaps I should also make reparations for my actions. I'll donate all my unspent profits to the Jedi.
Don't toy with me, scum!
They are being stored in the spaceport--here are the hangar details. I'll... take my business elsewhere.
Please, I'm a very busy man.
You mistake my intentions! Please, if there is any question about the slaves, I urge you to investigate.
